channel.title: uKnit quickstart on Codetab

item.title: uKnit - CodeTab
item.description: uKnit Quickstart To generate tests with uKnit the preferred, also the easier, is to add uknit-core as a dependency in your project pom. We explain this with uknit-quickstart example and you can use uKnit in your project in the same way. Installation process for Eclipse and IntelliJ IDEA is explained below and the procedure is more or less same for other IDE. uKnit needs Java 11 or higher, ensure that Java 11 or higher is installed in the IDE.
